articles.description: Hospitalizations from the coronavirus night dropped to 1,919 as of Friday night, the lowest level in more than three months and the first time under 2,000 since Nov. 12.
articles.content:
New Jersey health officials announced 3,641 confirmed coronavirus cases on Saturday and 49 additional deaths as hospitalizations fell below 2,000 and to the lowest level in more than three months.
